original_title: Visit Pallekele to know all about Chichi’s rocket: Namal
original_body_lines: All questions regarding Rohitha Rajapaksa's satellite can be answered with a visit to Pallekele, Kandy, MP Namal Rajapaksa said.
He was responding to a question during a live Q n A session on social media recently.
"You can learn all about it on your next trip to Kandy, with a visit to the Pallekele centre," MP Namal Rajapaksa said.
